divs: sighting detailswhile watching fireworks,my wife and i observed two orange\yellow orbs moving about the speed of small plane or hellicopter at a low alltitude,maybe 1000ft. moving south to north,arond the intersection of hwy 141,21 one seem to pause for a second and then resume flight path,flying in a straight line lasted about 45seconds till they were out of veiw
